content:
Prev: Soccer dads Up: 4th Practice Next: Shark, II

Shark



The object of the game is for the "shark" (one of the girls) to kick all the other girls' balls out of the field. This time they played a variation in which girls could come back into the game if someone else helped them in.
Taken Saturday, August 31, 2002, 10:33:10am.  Original image size: 2523x1682, 6.3Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/125s @ F8.0, ISO 100, 70-200mm/F2.8+1.4x @ 245mm (392mm equiv)
PS6 Crop, Colin 3.0 30:1.2:255, Curves 0:0 - 30:25 - 115:160 - 210:230 - 230:240 - 245:255, USM 70:2
